intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: Iago! Is that the throne room up ahead?

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: Yes, my liege. Nothing stand in our way. The kingdom of Hoshido is all yours!

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: Mwahaha, the time has finally come! I have awaited this moment for decades upon decades...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: ... Yes, Father. Please, sit on the throne and claim what is rightfully yours. Let us admire you in your first moments as the conqueror of Hoshido!

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: No. Stay right there.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Hm?

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: I must first consult the sacred mystical dragon, Anankos. No one may enter the throne room until I say so.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: ...Understood, Father.

intro.speaker: Garon
intro.line: Mwahahaha!! I am ruler of both Nohr and Hoshido, the two greatest kingdoms of all! I shall be remembered forever as the king who conquered the world!

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Corrin...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: It's all right, Azura. Once he's done praying to his god, we'll be allowed to join him in the throne room. Then everyone will finally see his true form. After all we've endured, waiting just a few moments longer is nothing.

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: You're right. It's almost time...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Relax, everyone. Father will give us permission to enter any minute now.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: The fighting is finally over. Let's lay down our weapons and rest easy for a change.

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Corrin, behind you!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Huh?!

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: Drat, I missed! What a slithery little snake you are.

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: What are you doing, Iago?! Why did you attack Corrin?

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: What am I doing? Is it not I who should be asking that question? What exactly do you think you're doing, Lord/Lady Corrin?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: What are you talking about?!

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: Princess Hinoka is alive and well. Do you deny it?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: That's...that's nonsense! You have no proof!

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: Oh? While you were fighting Prince Ryoma, I had soldiers search the castle grounds. What do you think they found? Surprise, surprise! Princess Hinoka with a small group quietly escaping from the back.

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: You don't seem surprised, young prince/princess. I take your silence as a confession. You let her escape, didn't you?! Such betrayal is an act of treason, and the only possible punishment is death.

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: As such, I think I'll go ahead and take your pathetic little life myself!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: No!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: As though I would ever allow that to happen.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Xander!

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: Out of my way, Prince Xander. Otherwise you too will be branded a traitor and executed for your crime.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: So be it. If you wish to kill Corrin, you will have to defeat me first. However, know that I do not intend to go down without a fight.

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: Wh-what do you mean?

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: I challenge you to a duel, Iago. I have had enough of you and your cruel manner of doing things. You are a disgrace to the great kingdom of Nohr, but that ends today. If you choose not to repent, the only fate left for you is to die by my blade. As the crown prince of Nohr, I am taking back my kingdom!

intro.speaker: Leo
intro.line: Count me in. I've long hoped for the chance to express my discontent with Iago's dirty schemes. If you are going to take him down, allow me to share in the pleasure.

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: You d-don't intend to kill me, do you?! Your king's trusted g-general? That's not very becoming of a N-Nohrian royal, now is it?!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Say what you will, coward. Our father is not here to protect his lapdog. We'll tell him you were murdered by some remaining Hoshidan rebels. How tragic.

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: What?! No! That's deceitful! It's traitorous! It's—

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Hmph! Who are you to judge us?! You and Hans have done nothing but awful things to innocent people for years! And what's more, you've been openly mean to Corrin! I've always hated you two! It's time to pay for being such big jerks!!

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: Hmm, well, I perhaps don't feel as strongly as our little Elise here... But anyone who tries to hurt my darling Corrin most certainly deserves death. It's only fair. You're ready to die now, I hope?

intro.speaker: Iago
intro.line: Lady Elise! Lady Camilla! Th-this is bad...

intro.speaker: Hans
intro.line: Are you traitors really turning your blades against your own?! Fine then! Bring it on, gwahaha! I don't care if you're a prince or a princess. You're weak—all of you!

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: It seems the only way to settle this is with a battle. Do not expect me to hold back. Though I do not regret returning to Nohr... I will not stand idly by while you desecrate the kingdom I grew up in!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: If it’s a fight you want, Hans, it’s a fight you’re going to get. I always try to avoid needless violence...but there’s an exception to every rule. You want to see me act more like you? Like a merciless killer? Then watch this. You may be on the side of Nohr, but I will punish you all the same!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Don't worry, Corrin. We all share the sentiment, and we have your back. You are still the leader of this army, and we are awaiting you orders. You have plotted the course, little prince/princess. Give the word, and we shall act upon it!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Right! Everyone, ready your weapons! These men have employed cowardly tactics to hurt innocent people! They have destroyed the reputation of our beloved kingdom! They are traitors, and they will pay for the crimes with their lives! Hurry my friends! It is time to obliterate the king's army and take back Nohr!

boss.speaker: Hans
boss.line: I've waited a long time to wipe that smug look of your face. This is what you get for not bowing down to my might!

boss.speaker: Hans
boss.line: Defeated? How?! No... It can't be... I was to be rewarded with power! So much...power...

boss.speaker: Iago
boss.line: You impertinent traitor! Your ragtag group is no match for my army! Let your death serve as an example to all those who dare oppose King Garon!

boss.speaker: Iago
boss.line: GAAAAH!! This can't...be happening! How could I lose?! King Garon, please...save...me...

boss.speaker: Iago
boss.line: Are you ready to pay for your betrayal, Lord/Lady Corrin?

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: No, Iago, I am ready to kill you.

boss.speaker: Iago
boss.line: Oh my, how very frightening. I'm trembling! I am the highest-ranking general in the Nohrian army, you fool. Do you really think I'll be so easy to kill? But before you die, I have something to tell you. A parting gift, if you will. It was I who sent the Faceless who killed that flying rat, Lilith.

boss.speaker: Iago
boss.line: Oh, and that's not all. It was I who suggested to King Garon that you be forced to kill Prince Ryoma. And I who told the enemy about your journey to Macarath. Did you enjoy my little gifts of sorrow? I put ever so much thought into them!

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: I will never forgive you for all that, Iago. Prepare to die!

boss.speaker: Iago
boss.line: Ha! So the imprisoned little prince/princess fancies himself/herself all grown up. The king ordered me to make you suffer without killing you... But I can no longer comply. In order to see my plans to fruition, you must die! Say your prayers, Lord/Lady Corrin!

end.speaker: Iago
end.line: Eeeeek! No! NO, PLEASE! I don't wanna d-d-die!!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: It's over, Iago. Have some dignity and let me finish you off quickly.

end.speaker: Iago
end.line: Please, Lord/Lady Corrin! Spare me! Have mercy! All we did was follow King Garon's orders, just like you! If you don't like our tactics, blame him! Punish him instead! I'm innocent! Innocent, I say! You wouldn't kill an innocent man, would you?

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Yeesh, this is getting embarrassing. How low are you going to stoop, Iago?

end.speaker: Iago
end.line: Lord Leo! I've known you since you were a child! As wise as you are, surely you understand the awful situation I'm in! Please, milord! Spare me! Tell your army how absurd it would be to kill me!

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: You are an eyesore, Iago. A cruel fiend who deserves nothing but a blade at your neck. I haven't any mercy to spare for someone like you. You are naught but a spineless coward who brings shame upon our beloved Nohr. These are your final moments. I suggest you muster some dignity for them.

end.speaker: Iago
end.line: Lord Leo? No! You can't! You—

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: For all the pain you have caused...to hell with you!!

end.speaker: Iago
end.line: GAAAAAAAH!!

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: *sigh* It is done.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Thank you, Leo.

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: It was nothing. It actually feels really nice, knowing he's out of our lives.

end.speaker: Elise
end.line: That's our Leo! Always thinking of the big picture and stuff!

end.speaker: Camilla
end.line: Good work, Brother. Now no one remains who can harm our precious Corrin.

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: Yes. This was truly our final battle.

end.speaker: Azura
end.line: Corrin... I think it's time.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: I know, Azura. I know. Everyone...I need to tell you something.

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: Oh? What's that?

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: The war isn't over just yet. There's still someone we must defeat before our world can know peace.

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: Out with it, Corrin.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: I'm sorry, but... That person is King Garon.

end.speaker: Leo
end.line: Father?!

end.speaker: Camilla
end.line: You...you can't really be telling us to kill our own father, can you?

end.speaker: Elise
end.line: That's a horrible thing to say! Why would you say something like that, Corrin?! I know he's rough around the edges, but together we can change him!

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: Explain yourself, Corrin. You have our attention.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: OK. This isn't going to be easy to hear... But you have to know. I fought so hard and sacrificed so much for this moment. I lost Lilith, Ryoma...even myself to an extent, just to make it this far. I did all that so I could show you, my family, the truth about Father.

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: And what is this truth of which you speak?

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Father...King Garon...is no longer human. He has become a monster, kept alive by someone or something truly unholy. There is no way to save him at this point...defeating him is our only option.

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: That's impossible... You must be joking!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: I'm sorry, Xander, but I'm dead serious. I had a hard time believing it myself, but I swear it's the truth. I can prove it to you, too. The truth about our Father...lies behind those doors.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Please, follow me. Let's go, Azura. We've waited long enough.

end.speaker: Azura
end.line: As you wish, Corrin.
